text: Residues evolving under positive selection in primate PARP9 . 1 Residue numbering corresponds to the human reference sequence ( XP _ 005247877 . 1 ) . 2 Known protein domains are indicated . 3 Residues with recurrent signatures of positive selection with a posterior probability greater than 0 . 95 were identified using a Bayes Empirical Bayes ( BEB ) analysis in PAML from the F364 codon frequency model . 4 Estimated dN / dS ratios from PAML . 5 Estimated errors for the indicated dN / dS ratio .
